QuestData.Title: Lunarblossom
QuestData.Description: How I long to hold Kat'la.$b$bNo star or moon can compare to her beauty.$b$bAlas, I am but a simple boar farmer.$b$bIf only I could find time to sneak away from this pathetic excuse for a job and pick some lunarblossoms for Kat'la.$b$bI wouldn't dare confess my love to her without a gift.
QuestData.RewardText: Lunarblossoms! You are too kind! I can't wait to give these to Kat'la.
